page_content: The page discusses tax implications for individuals involved in construction companies or consortia in the canton of Bern.
The page provides information on tax implications for individuals holding at least 10% stake in a capital company or cooperative.
The page discusses the tax deductibility of commuting costs for private vehicles.
The page discusses a cycling tour event and the associated traffic disruptions in the Saanenland area.
The page provides information on how to declare healthcare and accident costs for tax purposes.
The page briefly discusses the need for details about the type of accounting used in the tax year for agricultural and forestry activities.
The page provides information on various types of bank accounts and balances for tax purposes.
